title: 1964 Little League World Series
text: The <a href="Little%20League%20World%20Series">Little League World Series</a> took place between August 25 and August 29 in <a href="Williamsport%2C%20Pennsylvania">Williamsport, Pennsylvania</a>. Mid-Island Little League of <a href="Staten%20Island">Staten Island</a>, <a href="New%20York%20%28state%29">New York</a>, defeated Obispado Little League of <a href="Monterrey">Monterrey</a>, <a href="Nuevo%20Le%C3%B3n">Nuevo León</a>, <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a>, in the championship game of the 18th Little League World Series.
